ygData.subject: oracle
ygData.msgSnippet: ... on one as I really don t want to have to kill the Oracle to get one and buying one is out of the question for me given the status of my bank account.
ygData.messageBody:
>Is there a quest for the Oracle Robe? I've been searching and searching
>for
>info
on one as I really don't want to have to kill the Oracle to get one >and
buying
one is out of the question for me given the status of my bank account.

Well, according to Graffe's site, it says the quest might be broken since
nobody's really reported to completing it yet. Figures eh? :)

I've yet to visit that island, I think I'll wait a level or two before
venturing there to get a robe.

-- Lim'Dul
30 Wizzie Veeshan
